name: get_user_summary
description: Get user profile and financial snapshot including personal details, address, current balance, total income, total expenses, and transaction count. ALWAYS use this FIRST to validate the user and get their name. Returns full_name field which should be used to address the user throughout the conversation.

name: get_transactions
description: Flexible transaction search with powerful filtering. Returns detailed transaction list with all transaction details. Supports filtering by date range, month/year, type (Credit/Debit), category, payment source, status, and amount range. Use this when user asks for transaction details, lists, or specific filtered transactions.

month.description: Month number (1-12) for filtering. Use with year parameter.

startDate.description: Start date for range filter (YYYY-MM-DD format)

endDate.description: End date for range filter (YYYY-MM-DD format)

type.description: Filter by transaction type: 'Credit' for income, 'Debit' for expenses

category.description: Filter by category (partial match). Available: Salary, Shopping, Utilities, Dining, Transport, Entertainment, Health, Housing, Groceries, Transfer

paymentSource.description: Filter by payment source (partial match). Examples: 'Credit Card', 'Visa Debit', 'Account'

name: get_analytics
description: Get aggregated transaction statistics and breakdowns. Returns period summary (income, expense, net flow), breakdown by category with percentages, and breakdown by payment source. Use this when user asks for summaries, statistics, breakdowns, or 'how much did I spend on X'. Supports same filters as get_transactions.

month.description: Month number (1-12) for filtering. Defaults to current month if not specified.

year.description: Year (YYYY). Defaults to current year if not specified.

category.description: Filter analytics for specific category only

paymentSource.description: Filter analytics for specific payment source

name: get_metadata
description: Get available filter options for a user. Returns unique categories, payment sources, and years available in the user's transaction history. Use this to help the AI know what valid filter values exist for this user. Useful for autocomplete or suggesting filter options.
